item.title: PI- Spawn Restrictions
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“Epicmaul, post:2, topic:397068”][quote author=Mental Piracy link=topic=494222.msg3613099#msg3613099 date=1306767238]

be specific with your request, or get the fuck off. If you cant be bothered to give us the details we need to help, no one will bother.

moron…
HOW TO MAKE SOMETHING UNSPAWNABLE
EX.U CAN SPAWN ANYTHING U WANT EXCEPT D CLAWS HOW DO I MAKE DCLAWS UNSPAWENABLELGBERNT KNAG"TO#QEFW KO)UMORONNghijetw4adfs

You can spawn npcs, objects, and items you dumb fucking inbred… your post was horribly unspecific
[/quote]
item spawn -.- why would i want a fucking restriction for objects…[/quote]
Yeah, you are right, you probably cant even figure out how to create an object, as for your help, get it elsewhere, since you were a prick when i tried to inform you of this sections rule.

Its beyond simple, only need one if statement and an array to do it.

Read full topic
